meanings.definition: To bring or gather together in one place
meanings.sent1: I will collect all the toys and put them in the box.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked the students to collect their books before leaving.
meanings.sent3: The ants decided to collect all the food in the picnic basket for their feast.
meanings.sent4: The clouds seemed to collect above the mountain, ready to burst with rain.
meanings.sent5: She tried to collect her thoughts before giving her presentation.

meanings.sent1: He will collect the money for the tickets at the entrance.
meanings.sent2: The cashier will collect the payment for the groceries at the checkout.
meanings.sent3: The young boy pretended to collect payment for his imaginary ice cream stand.
meanings.sent4: The singer's voice seemed to collect coins from the audience's applause.
meanings.sent5: The landlord will collect the rent at the beginning of each month.

meanings.sent1: She likes to collect seashells during her beach trips.
meanings.sent2: Over the years, he managed to collect a vast collection of stamps.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried to collect as many acorns as possible before winter.
meanings.sent4: The library seemed to collect books of all genres on its shelves.
meanings.sent5: The artist would collect various colors of paint for her masterpiece.

meanings.definition: To call for and take away
meanings.sent1: The courier will collect the package from your doorstep.
meanings.sent2: The garbage truck will collect the trash from the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The vacuum cleaner robot can collect dust from all corners of the room.
meanings.sent4: The police officer will collect the evidence from the crime scene.
meanings.sent5: The delivery person will collect the returned items from your house.

meanings.definition: To gather or assemble for a specific purpose
meanings.sent1: The team will collect for a meeting to discuss the project.
meanings.sent2: The volunteers will collect at the park for the clean-up event.
meanings.sent3: The students will collect in the auditorium for the school assembly.
meanings.sent4: The family will collect at the dining table for dinner every evening.
meanings.sent5: The fans will collect at the stadium to cheer for their favorite team.
